name: Curse of the Blob King
description:
The older ones have flown out to a ceremony. A young witch takes advantage of the moment to finally cast the forbidden spell. She has no idea what will happen to her.

Help her deal with the consequences of her carelessness before the elders come back!

This game uses free soundtracks by Eric Matyas.  

PS: This is the second game of my "release a game every month in 2022" challenge. If you want to support this project, feel free to click the donate button above, recommend this game or be one of my first Patrons. Thanks :)

January game: A Warehouse Story
